review_title: Great place to start a career!
job_title: Senior Program Coordinator in Belgrade, Central Serbia
pros: Multinational and multicultural work environment, wide network of colleagues around the world.
cons: Not profit oriented, and hard to measure accomplishments.

review_title: Good friends and relationships with difficulty to progress
job_title: Regiona Trainer in Belgrade, Central Serbia
pros: Interesting job, lot of places to visit, share experience with people, opportunity to challenge your opinions. Having a chance to meet a lot of people and learn from them.
cons: Unclear administrative work, difficulty to understand promotion criteria with people who are not native Americans.
